response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Our product is valued at $1,200,000 by you, and we are eager to facilitate this transaction while ensuring both parties benefit.

We are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization services tailored to your specific needs, ensuring a smooth integration into your existing systems and processes.

Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer. We are confident that our product will provide substantial value to your organization and look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
